title: Article 7 : Brazilians start to unravel the mystery of North American insect bioluminescent systems
description: Here is my last article where we learn more about *Orfelia fultoni*, a fungus gnap and its blue light !

title: Article 6: Shedding new light on mysteries behind the light emission of fireflies.
description: Scientists have dug into the scientific literature to learn more about the mysterious phenomenon of bioluminescence.

title: Article 5: Amber-encased fossil shines light on evolution of bioluminescent insects
description: Preserved with 'life-like' fidelity, beetle from the Cretaceous is fireflies' missing fossil link.

title: Article 4: Bioluminescent tag to detect DNA break repair
description: Check out how scientist use bioluminescence to fight cancer!

title: Graph for data science module 4
description: The selected dataset is urchin_bio. It is a dataset of sea urchins biometry that shows several features from *Paracentrotus lividus* who have been sinned in Brittany or in urchins farm in Normandy.

title: Article 3: Newly discovered gene may give ‘sea pickles’ their glow.
description: In this third article, scientists have found how pyrosomes produce their light!

title: Article 2 : Fireflies shed light on the function of mitochondria
description: In this second article, we see how bioluminescence is used to monitor the activity of mitochondria.

title: Article 1 : Flashes bright when squeezed tight: How single-celled organisms light up the oceans
description: In this first article, we begin our journey into my topic, bioluminescence ! We take a closer look to an organism who can produce light and make the oceans shine.

title: About Me
description: Want to know more about me ? Then you are at the right place!
